sectiona.description: Use waggon to keep your customers, inventory, orders and payments in sync. Keep servicing your customers in-person or send them to an Online Store, generated by you, and hosted by us. We take all the pain points out of running an online store and ordering system so your customer can shop, purchase and pickup both safley and securly.
